title: Lvl-1 Enchant

properties.value: Lvl-1 Enchant is a utility spell in the standard spellbook, requiring level 7 Magic to cast. The spell enchants sapphire and opal items, primarily jewellery, granting 17.5 Magic experience when doing so.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Lvl-1 EnchantThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Enchant lvl-1 amulet
This article is about the spell. For the magic tablet, see Enchant sapphire or opal.
Lvl-1 Enchant
Released 24 May 2001 (Update)
Members No
Level 7
Spellbook Standard
Type Utility
Experience 17.5
Runes 1 1
Casting speed 3 ticks (7 on autocast)
Lectern Oak
Description For use on sapphire and opal jewellery
Animation
Sound Effect

Lvl-1 Enchant is a utility spell in the standard spellbook, requiring level 7 Magic to cast. The spell enchants sapphire and opal items, primarily jewellery, granting 17.5 Magic experience when doing so.

This spell can be transferred to a magic tablet by bringing the required runes and a piece of soft clay to a lectern in the study of a player-owned house, granting the same experience as casting the spell.

List of items[edit | edit source]

Free-to-play players can only use the spell to enchant the sapphire amulet.

Unenchanted Enchanted Profit[e 1]
Item GE price Item GE price
Sapphire ring 523 Ring of recoil 816 199
Sapphire bracelet 533 Bracelet of clay 565 −62
Sapphire necklace 521 Games necklace 860 245
Sapphire amulet 581 Amulet of magic 639 −36
Silvthrill rod N/A Silvthrill rod (e) N/A N/A
Opal ring 499 Ring of pursuit 579 −14
Opal bracelet 686 Expeditious bracelet 1,357 577
Opal necklace 765 Dodgy necklace 1,688 829
Opal amulet 435 Amulet of bounty 656 127
  1. ↑ Includes spell costs; column assumes an appropriate rune-providing item is used.
